title: Project Foundation & Core Data Model
description: Set up Xcode project with SwiftUI, MVVM architecture, Core Data persistence layer with 9 entities (User, BodyRecord, MetabolismSnapshot, Food, FoodRecord, ExerciseRecord, SleepRecord, DailyLog, Goal), and utility services for date handling and input validation.

phases.title: Enum Definitions & Type Safety
phases.description: Create all required enums for Core Data entities to provide type-safe access to coded values

subtasks.title: Create Gender Enum
subtasks.description: Define Gender enum with male/female cases matching Core Data Int16 values (0: male, 1: female)
subtasks.notes: Gender enum fully implemented with male/female cases (0, 1), Int16 rawValue, Korean display names (ÎÇ®ÏÑ±, Ïó¨ÏÑ±), CaseIterable, Codable, and Identifiable conformance. Already committed in previous session.

subtasks.title: Create ActivityLevel Enum
subtasks.description: Define ActivityLevel enum with 5 levels and TDEE multipliers (1.2, 1.375, 1.55, 1.725, 1.9)
acceptance_criteria: Cases: sedentary (1), light (2), moderate (3), active (4), veryActive (5)
multiplier property returning correct TDEE coefficient
subtasks.notes: ActivityLevel enum fully implemented with 5 cases (sedentary=1, light=2, moderate=3, active=4, veryActive=5), correct TDEE multipliers (1.2, 1.375, 1.55, 1.725, 1.9), Korean display names, and required protocol conformances (CaseIterable, Codable, Identifiable). Already committed in previous session.

subtasks.title: Create MealType Enum
subtasks.description: Define MealType enum for food records (breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack)
subtasks.notes: MealType enum fully implemented with breakfast (0), lunch (1), dinner (2), snack (3) cases, Int16 rawValue, Korean display names (ÏïÑÏπ®, Ï†êÏã¨, Ï†ÄÎÖÅ, Í∞ÑÏãù), and required protocol conformances (CaseIterable, Codable, Identifiable). Already committed in commit 9c1d070.

subtasks.title: Create ExerciseType Enum
subtasks.description: Define ExerciseType enum with 8 exercise types and MET values by intensity
acceptance_criteria: Cases: walking (0), running (1), cycling (2), swimming (3), weight (4), crossfit (5), yoga (6), other (7)
MET values for each exercise type by intensity level
subtasks.notes: ExerciseType enum fully implemented with all 8 exercise types (walking=0, running=1, cycling=2, swimming=3, weight=4, crossfit=5, yoga=6, other=7), MET values by intensity matching ERD specification exactly, Korean display names, and required protocol conformances. Already committed in commit e07251d.

subtasks.title: Create Intensity Enum
subtasks.description: Define Intensity enum for exercise intensity levels (low, medium, high)
subtasks.notes: Intensity enum fully implemented with low (0), medium (1), high (2) cases, Int16 rawValue, Korean display names (ÎÇÆÏùå, Î≥¥ÌÜµ, ÎÜíÏùå), and required protocol conformances (CaseIterable, Codable, Identifiable). Already committed in commit 446edf5.

subtasks.title: Create FoodSource Enum
subtasks.description: Define FoodSource enum for food data sources
subtasks.notes: FoodSource enum fully implemented with kfdaAPI (0), usdaAPI (1), userCreated (2) cases, Int16 rawValue, Korean display names (ÏãùÌíàÏùòÏïΩÌíàÏïàÏ†ÑÏ≤ò, ÎØ∏Íµ≠ ÎÜçÎ¨¥Î∂Ä, ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê ÏÉùÏÑ±), and required protocol conformances (CaseIterable, Codable, Identifiable). Already committed in commit 89925e1.

subtasks.title: Create GoalType Enum
subtasks.description: Define GoalType enum for user goals
subtasks.notes: GoalType enum fully implemented with lose (0), maintain (1), gain (2) cases, Int16 rawValue, Korean display names (Í∞êÎüâ, Ïú†ÏßÄ, Ï¶ùÎüâ), and required protocol conformances (CaseIterable, Codable, Identifiable). Already committed in commits 3fab35a and b1d29fa.

subtasks.title: Create SleepStatus Enum
subtasks.description: Define SleepStatus enum with duration thresholds for status determination
acceptance_criteria: Cases: bad (0), soso (1), good (2), excellent (3), oversleep (4)
Static method to determine status from duration in minutes
Duration thresholds: bad<330, soso 330-389, good 390-449, excellent 450-540, oversleep>540
Korean localized display names and emoji indicators
subtasks.notes: SleepStatus enum fully implemented with all 5 cases (bad=0, soso=1, good=2, excellent=3, oversleep=4), static factory method from(durationMinutes:) for status determination, correct duration thresholds (<330, 330-389, 390-449, 450-540, >540), Korean display names with emoji indicators (üî¥üü°üü¢üîµüü†), and required protocol conformances (CaseIterable, Codable, Identifiable). Already committed in commits c0c11da and 650cd6d.

subtasks.title: Create QuantityUnit Enum
subtasks.description: Define QuantityUnit enum for food quantity units
subtasks.notes: QuantityUnit enum fully implemented with serving (0), gram (1) cases, Int16 rawValue, Korean display names (Ïù∏Î∂Ñ, Í∑∏Îû®), and required protocol conformances (CaseIterable, Codable, Identifiable). Already committed in commit 054811b.

subtasks.title: Create Constants File
subtasks.description: Define app-wide constants for validation limits and default values
acceptance_criteria: Validation ranges: height 100-250cm, weight 20-300kg, bodyFat 3-60%, etc.
Default activity level, serving size defaults
subtasks.notes: Constants file fully implemented with comprehensive validation ranges (height 100-250cm, weight 20-300kg, bodyFat 3-60%, muscleMass 10-60kg, birthYear 1900-current, name 1-20 chars, exerciseDuration 1-480min, servingQuantity 0.1-100, gramQuantity 1-10000), sleep boundary hour (2), default values (activityLevel=moderate, servingSize=100g, goalType=maintain), BMR calculation constants (Mifflin-St Jeor equation for male/female), TDEE calculation references, calorie adjustment constants, macro ratios, and body composition notes. Uses enum namespacing pattern, Korean documentation, and educational comments. Already committed in commit 386bd3c.

phases.title: Utility Services
phases.description: Create DateUtils for sleep boundary logic and ValidationService for input validation

subtasks.title: Create DateUtils
subtasks.description: Utility for date handling with 02:00 sleep boundary logic
acceptance_criteria: getLogicalDate(for:) returns previous day if hour < 2 (02:00)
isNewDayForSleep(at:) checks if time is past 02:00 boundary
Date formatting utilities for Korean locale
subtasks.notes: DateUtils fully implemented with all acceptance criteria met: getLogicalDate(for:) correctly applies 02:00 sleep boundary logic (01:59‚Üíprev day, 02:00‚Üícurrent day), isNewDayForSleep(at:) checks boundary, startOfDay/endOfDay helpers, Korean locale date formatting utilities (formatFullDate, formatShortDate, formatDateWithWeekday, formatTime, formatDateTime), comprehensive documentation with examples, date comparison methods (isSameDay, isToday, daysBetween), and age calculation. Implementation verified and working correctly.

subtasks.title: Create ValidationService
subtasks.description: Input validation service with all range checks from spec
acceptance_criteria: validateAge: birth year 1900 to current year
ValidationResult type with isValid, errorMessage properties
subtasks.notes: ValidationService fully implemented with all acceptance criteria met: validateHeight (100-250cm), validateWeight (20-300kg), validateBodyFatPercent (3-60%), validateMuscleMass (10-60kg), validateAge (birth year 1900 to current), validateName (1-20 chars, non-empty), validateExerciseDuration (1-480 min), validateFoodQuantity (0.1-100 servings or 1-10000g with unit awareness), ValidationResult struct with isValid/errorMessage properties, user-friendly Korean error messages, and bonus validateBodyComposition for composite validation of weight/body fat/muscle mass consistency. Already implemented in commit ba7669a.

subtasks.title: Create Date+Extensions
subtasks.description: Convenience extensions for Date type
acceptance_criteria: age(from birthDate:) static method for calculating age
subtasks.notes: Date+Extensions fully implemented with all acceptance criteria met: startOfDay and endOfDay computed properties for day boundaries, static age(from:referenceDate:) method for age calculation, isSameDay(as:) comparison method, isToday computed property, daysBetween(and:) method for date range calculations, and formatted(style:) method with FormatStyle enum (full, short, withWeekday, time, dateTime) for Korean locale date formatting. All methods delegate to DateUtils for consistent behavior. Includes comprehensive Korean documentation with examples. Already committed in commit 96c7cc6.

subtasks.title: Create Decimal+Extensions
subtasks.description: Convenience extensions for Decimal type used in Core Data
subtasks.notes: Decimal+Extensions fully implemented with all acceptance criteria met: doubleValue and intValue computed properties for type conversion, init(double:) initializer for creating Decimal from Double, rounded(scale:) method for decimal place rounding using NSDecimalRound, formatted(decimalPlaces:) method for UI display strings. Implementation includes comprehensive Korean documentation with educational comments comparing to Java BigDecimal, usage scenarios, and examples. Follows same patterns as Date+Extensions. Already committed in commit 7147a48.

subtasks.title: Create Formatters Utility
subtasks.description: Centralized formatters for consistent number/date formatting
acceptance_criteria: Shared DateFormatter instances for different formats
Shared NumberFormatter for calories, weight, etc.
subtasks.notes: Avoid creating formatters in loops - use shared instances

phases.title: Domain Entities
phases.description: Create pure Swift domain models that mirror Core Data entities for business logic

subtasks.title: Create User Domain Entity
subtasks.description: Pure Swift struct for User with all properties and computed age
acceptance_criteria: User struct with Identifiable, Codable, Equatable
All properties from ERD: id, name, gender, birthDate, height, activityLevel
Current values: currentWeight, currentBodyFatPct, currentMuscleMass, currentBMR, currentTDEE

subtasks.title: Create BodyRecord Domain Entity
subtasks.description: Pure Swift struct for BodyRecord with auto-calculation logic
acceptance_criteria: BodyRecord struct with Identifiable, Codable, Equatable
Properties: id, userId, date, weight, bodyFatMass, bodyFatPercent, muscleMass, createdAt
Helper methods for bodyFatMass ‚Üî bodyFatPercent calculation
subtasks.notes: Per ERD: bodyFatMass = weight √ó (bodyFatPercent/100)

subtasks.title: Create MetabolismSnapshot Domain Entity
subtasks.description: Pure Swift struct for MetabolismSnapshot (1:1 with BodyRecord)
acceptance_criteria: MetabolismSnapshot struct with Identifiable, Codable, Equatable
Properties: id, userId, bodyRecordId, date, weight, bodyFatPct, bmr, tdee, activityLevel, createdAt
subtasks.notes: Created automatically when BodyRecord is saved

subtasks.title: Create Food Domain Entity
subtasks.description: Pure Swift struct for Food master data
acceptance_criteria: Food struct with Identifiable, Codable, Equatable
Nutritional info: calories, carbs, protein, fat, sodium, fiber, sugar

subtasks.title: Create FoodRecord Domain Entity
subtasks.description: Pure Swift struct for FoodRecord (meal log entry)
acceptance_criteria: FoodRecord struct with Identifiable, Codable, Equatable
Properties: id, userId, foodId, date, mealType, quantity, quantityUnit
Calculated values: calculatedCalories, calculatedCarbs, calculatedProtein, calculatedFat
Method to calculate nutrition from Food and quantity

subtasks.title: Create ExerciseRecord Domain Entity
subtasks.description: Pure Swift struct for ExerciseRecord with calorie calculation
acceptance_criteria: ExerciseRecord struct with Identifiable, Codable, Equatable
Properties: id, userId, date, exerciseType, duration, intensity, caloriesBurned, note

subtasks.title: Create SleepRecord Domain Entity
subtasks.description: Pure Swift struct for SleepRecord with auto-status calculation
acceptance_criteria: SleepRecord struct with Identifiable, Codable, Equatable
Properties: id, userId, date, duration, status, createdAt, updatedAt

subtasks.title: Create DailyLog Domain Entity
subtasks.description: Pure Swift struct for DailyLog (daily aggregation)
acceptance_criteria: DailyLog struct with Identifiable, Codable, Equatable
Intake section: totalCaloriesIn, totalCarbs, totalProtein, totalFat, macro ratios
Exercise section: totalCaloriesOut, exerciseMinutes, exerciseCount, steps
subtasks.notes: Central entity for dashboard display

subtasks.title: Create Goal Domain Entity
subtasks.description: Pure Swift struct for Goal with target validation
acceptance_criteria: Goal struct with Identifiable, Codable, Equatable
Start values: startWeight, startBodyFatPct, startMuscleMass, startBMR, startTDEE

update(from:) method to update from User struct

acceptance_criteria.description: Xcode project created with iOS 17+ target and SwiftUI lifecycle
Core Data model implements all 9 entities from ERD

acceptance_criteria.description: MVVM folder structure established (Views, ViewModels, Models, Services, Utils)
acceptance_criteria.notes: Clean Architecture hybrid: Presentation, Domain, Data, Infrastructure, Shared

acceptance_criteria.description: PersistenceController manages Core Data stack with save/fetch operations
acceptance_criteria.notes: Basic implementation with save, newBackgroundContext, performBackgroundTask

acceptance_criteria.description: DateUtils handles 02:00 sleep boundary logic correctly
ValidationService validates all input ranges (height 100-250cm, weight 20-300kg, etc.)
